verses.verse: Make a joyful shout <S%H7321><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> all the earth! <S%H776><s%>
Sing to <S%H2167><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of his name! <S%H8034><s%> Offer <S%H7760><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and praise! <S%H8416><s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> "How awesome <S%H3372><s%> are your deeds! <S%H4639><s%> Through the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of your power, <S%H5797><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> submit themselves to you. <S%H3584><s%>
All the earth <S%H776><s%> will worship <S%H7812><s%> you, <S%H2167><s%> and will sing to you; <S%H2167><s%> they will sing to your name. <S%H8034><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Come, <S%H3212><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s deeds <S%H4659><s%>â€” awesome <S%H3372><s%> work <S%H4659><s%> on behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> into dry <S%H3004><s%> land. <S%H5674><s%> They went through the river <S%H5104><s%> on foot. <S%H7272><s%> There, <S%H8055><s%> we rejoiced in him.

He rules <S%H4910><s%> by his might <S%H1369><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%> Don't <S%H5637><s%> let the rebellious rise up <S%H7311><s%> against him. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
Praise <S%H1288><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> you peoples! <S%H5971><s%> Make the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his praise <S%H8416><s%> heard, <S%H8085><s%>
who preserves <S%H7760><s%> our life <S%H5315><s%> among the living, <S%H2416><s%> and doesn't <S%H5414><s%> allow our feet <S%H7272><s%> to be moved. <S%H4132><s%>
For you, <S%H430><s%> God, have tested <S%H974><s%> us. <S%H6884><s%> You have refined us, <S%H3701><s%> as silver is refined. <S%H6884><s%>
You brought <S%H935><s%> us into prison. <S%H4686><s%> You laid <S%H7760><s%> a burden <S%H4157><s%> on our backs. <S%H4975><s%>

You allowed men <S%H582><s%> to ride <S%H7392><s%> over our heads. <S%H7218><s%> We went <S%H935><s%> through fire <S%H784><s%> and through water, <S%H4325><s%> but you brought us to <S%H3318><s%> the place of abundance. <S%H7310><s%>
I will come <S%H935><s%> into your temple <S%H1004><s%> with burnt offerings. <S%H5930><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows to you, <S%H5088><s%>
which my lips <S%H8193><s%> promised, <S%H6475><s%> and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> spoke, <S%H6475><s%> when I was in distress. <S%H6862><s%>

I will offer <S%H5927><s%> to you burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> of fat animals, <S%H4220><s%> with the offering <S%H7004><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> I will offer <S%H6213><s%> bulls <S%H1241><s%> with goats. <S%H6260><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Come, <S%H3212><s%> and hear, <S%H8085><s%> all you who fear <S%H3373><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> I will declare <S%H5608><s%> what he has done <S%H6213><s%> for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
I cried <S%H7121><s%> to him with my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> He was extolled <S%H7311><s%> with <S%H8478><s%> my tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
If I cherished sin in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> the Lord wouldn't <S%H136><s%> have listened.
But most certainly, <S%H403><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has listened. <S%H8085><s%> He has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God, <S%H430><s%> who has not turned away <S%H5493><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> nor his loving kindness from me. <S%H2617><s%>
